amendment.description: Amendment sought to add language to require the disclosure of funding designed to influence shareholder votes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in the Congressional Record to add a requirement for disclosure of activities to influence votes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 222 (Roll no. 236).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Sessions.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 222 (Roll no. 236).
